title: Summarize Installed R Libraries
text: can install development version libminerWHM GitHub :

title: Summarize Installed R Libraries
text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . also use GitHub Actions re-render README.Rmd every time push. example workflow can found : https://github.com/r-lib/actions/tree/v1/examples. can also embed plots, example:  case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(libminerWHM) ## basic example code summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
text: Provides brief summary installed packages local machine

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
text: sizes logical show library sizes bytes

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
code: lib_summary() #>                           library n_packages #> 1 /home/runner/work/_temp/Library         68 #> 2      /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/library         29 #> 3 /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/site-library          1 lib_summary(sizes = TRUE) #>                           library n_packages lib_size #> 1 /home/runner/work/_temp/Library         68 73648323 #> 2      /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/library         29 69574120 #> 3 /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/site-library          1 14569622
